name: Ultimate Combat Fighting
description:
Prepare yourself for the Ultimate Combat Fighting challenge! Fight your way to become a black belt martial arts master! Learn all the moves and beat your opponents in this intensive action fighting game.

- FEATURES -
- Great fighting action!
- Lots of different opponents
- Develop your character to earn the black belt!
- Find and learn new smashing moves!
- Incredible new swipe based control! Easy to learn, hard to master
- Beat your opponents on many awesome locations!
